Iâ€™m applying to PhD programs for the Fall 2022 cycle. My current research interests lie in the intersection of theoretical and computational approaches to semantics & pragmatics, syntax, and linguistic typology.

Here at UT, Iâ€™ve been working with John Beavers on a project investigating verb class constraints on the English middle construction (e.g. This car sells well). Last summer, I was an intern at CMUâ€™s Language Technologies Institute where I worked with Shruti Rijhwani and Graham Neubig on transfer learning for OCR post-correction of endangered language text.
